I'm not qualified to provide medical advice, including how much force to apply to set a dislocated wrist back in place. Reducing a dislocation is a delicate procedure that should only be performed by trained medical professionals to avoid further injury.

If you suspect someone has a wrist dislocation, please seek immediate medical help from a healthcare provider or emergency services. They have the appropriate knowledge and tools to treat such injuries safely.
